featured.text: He didn’t want to take Shaw’s insult.
He participated in three revolutions and fought with people when he was insulted.

definition.zh_def: 侮辱，冒犯，對某人或某事表達輕蔑或不尊重的言語或行為。
definition.en_def: To speak to or treat someone with disrespect or scorn; a remark or action that is disrespectful.
definition.example: He didn't mean to insult her, but his words came out wrong.
